meanings.definition: To call back or summon again.
meanings.sent1: After losing his favorite toy, Timmy tried resummoning it with a magic spell.
meanings.sent2: The wizard was resummoning the ancient spirits to seek their guidance.
meanings.sent3: The cat kept resummoning its owner by meowing at the door.
meanings.sent4: The memories of her childhood resummoned a sense of nostalgia within her.
meanings.sent5: The superhero resummoned his powers just in time to save the city from disaster.

meanings.definition: The act of calling back or summoning again.
meanings.sent1: The resummoning of the ghostly apparition startled everyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: The resummoning of the ancient deity was a sacred ritual performed once a year.
meanings.sent3: The resummoning of the mischievous spirit led to chaos in the haunted house.
meanings.sent4: The resummoning of the forgotten memories brought a flood of emotions to the surface.
meanings.sent5: The resummoning of the legendary hero inspired hope in the hearts of the people.
